name: Astral Projection for the Modern Business
name_original: Astral Projection for the Modern Business
description:
Imagine if astral projection were real, and you could send your soul out to explore the entire world, or unknown and stranger dimensions beyond that? What if the world was falling apart? What if you still had to work from home?

This is a satirical instruction manual on how astral projection can enhance and synergise the business sphere, taking video calls and employee observation to a brand new level, featuring the funky public domain imagery. 

Short project, shouldn't take more than a few minutes to read.
I hope you enjoy it!
